content.detailedDescription:
Starting on the evening of feb. 2. 2012, i observed a brighter than normal light in the north sky from our back yard at approximately 8 - 9pm, which so exceeded the brightness of all other stars visible that it caught my interest and i brought out my nikon digital camera and tripod to photograph it.  upon focusing in, there appeared a glowing sphere on top of an upright oval shape which also glowed a golden color, with the sphere slightly offset to the right of the upright oval shape, similar to an icon of a person, if you will..  hence, two apparent objects very close to one another or connected in some manner.  i was surprised to discover the dual nature of the object and how they each had distinctly different shapes, yet appeared to glow the same golden color.

there were multiple witnesses to this event in my backyard at the time and we all saw the object(s) and thought it quite unusual as this was not commonly seen at this time of night or in that region of sky, nor have i ever seen anything of comparable brightness to it in the night sky near my home.

my wife and i discussed this and said amongst ourselves "..This could be a satellite or some other type of object but it doesn't appear to be any type of star we've ever seen."  i resolved to attempt to study this object further and see if it might reappear the following night.  if so, would that indicate it is a natural object or is in a fixed orbit at that precise location?

i took 6 photographs on 2/2, then attempted to repeat the observations on 2/3 and did indeed see the object in the night sky in the same relative location, although this particular night, the object displayed different colors; i took 3 pictures on the evening of 2/3/12.  the sphere was glowing white and the base (upright oval portion) was dark blue in color.  my camera is a nikon d60 10mp with 200mm zoom in manual mode.  5-second and 8-second exposures were done on a tripod
with a timer so no possible bumping of the camera or jitter could be induced into the image.
content.summary: Glowing sphere offset on top of upright oval shape, also glowing

content.detailedDescription: Heading w. on either jack williams,bull creek,or whatever it is between hwy 36 and 107 heading into enola,ark.Looked in rear view mirror,saw lights i hadn't noticed before,thought they were probablly farm lights in the distance,1 white light,one amber about 45 degrees above and to the side,didnt think much of it til i rounded a turn and changed directions that i saw the same thing again in mirror.I go the same route every tuesday evening ,never seen that,but i know they fly a lot of c-130s up in that area,kind of think thats probably what it was,who knows?
content.summary: Saw lights in rear view,thought farm,,turned corner,saw same lights in rear view mirror

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were driving home on highway 80. right before we exited the freeway, i saw a blue light hovering and a white light falling. i thought it was a falling star. they were little lights that would change color between white, blue, and purple. i then saw the white one change direction right at the horizon. it moved up on the other side of the blue light. the blue light started moving at this point. we pulled over on the road to watch. they flew around for about 5 minutes. they would go every direction and when they changed direction it was very abrupt. we wanted to get a closer look so we started to head towards them again. we lost sight for a few seconds and they disappeared. the sky was clear that night. they were far away and moved really fast.
content.summary: Two lights on horizon, flighing up and down, changing direction and hovering.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were driving home on highway 80. right before we exited the freeway, i saw a blue light hovering and a white light falling. i thought it was a falling star. they were little lights that would change color between white, blue, and purple. i then saw the white one change direction right at the horizon. it moved up on the other side of the blue light. the blue light started moving at this point. we pulled over on the road to watch. they flew around for about 5 minutes. they would go every direction and when they changed direction it was very abrupt. we wanted to get a closer look so we started to head towards them again. we lost sight for a few seconds and they disappeared. the sky was clear that night. they were far away and moved really fast.
content.summary: Two lights on horizon, flighing up and down, changing direction and hovering.

content.detailedDescription: A being come toward me from my living room very quickly stands by my head next to my bed. looks right at me and then begins to choke me. i can not scream or talk. i can not breath my arms are moving wildly. then it is gone. the being was hairless had large eyes but not abnormally so. about 3-4 ft tall large forehead. i had been sleeping, at first thought it was a dream but the surroundings were identical to my home.
content.summary: Alien like being choking me

content.detailedDescription: Taking pics of homes in bel air, ca.  upon viewing photos i noticed three objects in the sky, they were in a triangle formation.
content.summary: Discs showed up on photos, did not notice while taking the pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
On friday february 3, 2012 beginning at approximately 7:45 pm est, my wife and i were driving home from dining out, travelling west on us route 33 from elkins, wv past buckhannon, wv to interstate 79.  at approximately 8:00pm est we first observed unusual lights in the sky to the south of us 33.  this would have occurred in eastern randolph county or western upshur county.  we both observed these lights for approximately the next 25 minutes.  it was a single flying object that moved at varying rates of speed, in varying directions and at varying elevations, and briefly stayed fixed at one location before accelerating away.  however, the objects general flight path was from the se toward the nw.  at times the object appeared to be approx a mile to the south of us 33, then several miles to the south, and occassionally a little to the north of us 33.  the object appeared to vary in altitude, generally from approx 500 ft to 2,000 ft above ground, until it began climbing to maybe a mile or more in altitude at the end of the time that we could observe the object.

the object was unusual for two reasons:  1. its varying flight path, as described above; 2. the odd variety and geometric shape of lights on the object.

the object had three distinct types/shapes of lights that stayed fixed in relationship to each other on the flying object:
1. a single very bright continuous light (or perhaps two lights close together) near the "top" or uppermost portion of the object.  this light was a very bright white to yellow-white color, and did not blink nor flash.
2. a large continuous string of lights, approximately but not exactly, triangular in shape.  these lights were also quite bright, but not as bright as the light listed in 1. above.  this triangular shape of lights appeared to be very large, easily 200 to 300 ft in each direction of the triangle.  this triangle shape was always pointing toward the ground, and always appeared lower to the ground than the light described in 1. above. these lights were a blue-white color, and did not blink nor flash.
3. two continuous strings of lights in straight lines that appeared to be approx 100 to 200 ft in length, that seemed to angle out of the center of the object.  these lights were by far the dimmest, and were only visible when we were at our closest point to the object - approx one-half to one mile away from it.  these lights were a bright green color, and did not blink nor flash.

we lost sight of the object, at approx 8:25pm est, because it accelerated rapidly away toward the nw and climbed in elevation.  i estimate the object flew over i79 at about 8:20pm est, somewhere around or just north of exit 99, heading nw at a rapid speed and climbing.

neither i nor my wife has ever seen anything like this flying object, nor have we ever seen an object before that we would definitely classify as a ufo.  i have two engineering degrees and manage a technical consulting firm.  my wife has an accounting degree and works in banking.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large object, multiple lights, triangular shape, changed direction and descended/ascended multiple times; hovered; slow speed then rapid acceleration.

content.detailedDescription:
As i arrived home from shopping, i glance upwards to see a bright object streak a short distance across the sky. the motion, size and speed made me think of the rapid fight of a bird diving, but    it was radiating light, and once i focused on the location, it was clear the object was very high in the sky.
i was looking upwards almost straight up, facing south. the object streaked in a short east- to-west path almost directly above me in a distinct straight line and horizontal path. the object appeared to be shaped like a pumpkin seed, or maybe a rounded/tapered missile, and it was a pale orange color, leaving a distinct similar trail, but of a lighter shade, surrounded by a very faint aura. the most striking thing about it was the sudden appearance in a clear patch of sky. it was only visible for an instant, then vanished. to approximate the distance of the flight path, it's roughly the same if you hold your hands at arm's length and hold them two inches apart. the impression i have of the trail is it starting abruptly like a broken line and fading just a microsecond before the object.

after i saw the object, i was excited, but felt cheated that it was over so fast. i went to the back yard where the view is less obstructed, where i watched for several minutes more and saw nothing else.

i immediately thought the object might be a meteor, but the several meteors i have seen before were more starlike and left longer, brighter trails across the sky.
content.summary: Bright object streaked a short distance across sky before vanishing.

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on route 5 in holyoke, massachusetts at 8:15pm 2/2/12. first noticed the lights obscured by trees to the east. initially thought it was a large military aircraft; a c5a flying very low. once it cleared the trees on a west/southwest path it crossed over my car at approximately 4000 feet. it was dark so i could only see lights and a bit of a wing. it was extremely large, bigger than a c5. it was a swept wing with no distinguishable tail. there were 3 very large white lights, one on each wing and one on the front that were not blinking. there was one smaller red light on the belly that was blinking steadily. there were no strobes or after burners. as it passed over my car i put my window down to get a better look and realized it was completely silent. there was no sound of an engine or distinguishable power source. it continued west/southwest and i lost sight of it behind mt. tom.
content.summary: Large triangular shape with large white lights on wings and nose, red blinking light on the bottom

content.detailedDescription: I went out on my deck to cover my grill up from cooking earlier at about 11 pm. after covering my grill i looked up to check out the stars. i'm a advid sky watcher so i looked east over my roof to look at the stars because there was a few clouds in the area and this area was clear. as i was looking i saw what looked like a star moving so as i stared at it and thought it was a satalite at first but then noticed it was five lights and had appeared to look like a formation. as i watched it move i yelled to my wife in the living room to come out to see this. i was very excited to see this, i've seen objects before. she didn't make it fast enough but i noticed as it neared the haze of the clouds it had a shape of a v. one light at the point and two on each angle, this was trianular shaped object moving slower than a commercial aircraft and made no sound. i don't know the altitude but seemed to be around the same as the clouds. as it turned north it disappeared into the haze of the clouds.I would not have noticed this object except for staring at this one point in the sky because it blended so well with the stars. the lights on the object were the same brightness as the average stars in the sky.Like i said i've seen objects before that i can't explain and i know aircraft well and satalites and this was unusual. i would like to know if anyone else saw this. i don't call the police because i did this once years ago and they didn't take me serious and i know what i saw.This is why i turned to you guys. feel free to contact me if you have any questions. thank you
content.summary: Slowly heading nw and slight turn to the north then disappeared into the haze of the clouds and made no noise

content.detailedDescription: Pic posted of these two funnel clouds that went up into this strange cloud, were quiet but seemed to expand and look like some sorta vortex. you be the judge....
content.summary: Weird spiral vortex type clouds, almost like tornadoes with no rain/wind/storm

content.detailedDescription: Was going out at around 5:36am to start my car before work and looked up into the sky to see stars as well as a much brighter object moving slowly directly above me. the object looked about 5 times bigger than a star and was moving east. i walked along my house as it moved trying to look for any flashing lights, etc. and concluded there where no flashing lights of any kind only a bright star like light. the object did seem to wobble from side to side as it moved instead of a straight point to point movement. i felt in awe because of military experience i have seen many planes, helicopters, and this was definitely none of them. there was absolutely no sound of any kind. the total experience lasted a total of 5 minutes as it kept moving till it was completely out of sight. the object did move slowly as a plane would move but was to low and to bright to be a plane considering there was no noise or flashing lights. did not grab a camera since i would not have had enough time to put the battery in and start shooting video before it was gone, though i did have a cellphone i didn't not take a picture since the quality when have been beyond poor, i did however note the time.
content.summary: White star light over ripon, wi

content.detailedDescription:
On january 31st 2012, at 3:30 pm i decided to go from my home to clear my mind at a large park about two miles away from my home (very peaceful place). i was at rose mofford park located at 9833 n. 25th ave. phoenix, az (on 25th avenue just north of dunlap). 

this park generally has many people playing sports in the afternoon and some people having lunch or relaxing during the day. at that time of the day i had walked buy two full soccer games involving preteens and kids. i decided since i wanted peace and sunlight that i would avoid the soccer fields and go on the way to the running track area, which i did. i proceeded to lay down on the grass on the outside of the track on its west side. it was completely cloudless that day which is very typical of phoenix. i was affixed at looking into the sky as i did when i was a child... like looking at the clouds and guessing what they might resemble. that was my state of mind at the time. 

i soon noticed a small dot in the sky that could have not bee a plane by any stretch of the imagination. i looked a little deeper and thought it couldnt be a bird... no bird would ever fly so high alone that it was nothing more than a tiny black dot (size of a pin head or smaller). i chose to ignore that dot and decided to gaze at the whole sky rather just out of relaxation. i widened my gaze and the whole viewable sky  and immediately came across something out of place... a formation of 6 semi transparent or muted color orbs forming a slightly unorganized cross system. one orb was a darker gray color and was bigger than the others, this orb was off center (top left of the cross intersection). this system of orbs moved slowly across the sky (as if quietly cruising) as one unchanging group. none of the orbs moved independently of the others. they moved as one system. in between the orbs it appeared just as the rest of the sky or completely transparent. 

i was baffled, but not surprised or skeptical to see this. this is the second time ive seen a truly unmistakable alien craft or ufo in the sky and dont regularly go looking for them at all. even my choice to go to the park to clear my mind in the middle of the day like that was absolutely out of character (been at leased a whole year since i did that type of thing). 

to debunk any skeptics, yes i was here when phoenix lights occurred but was not an eye witness in any way. for the record, that event doesnt & didnt cross my mind during this sighting. that event was never fresh in my mind since i had no personal attachment to / experience with it. with that said, the phoenix lights event has no bearing on my current experience. i was not looking for this sort of thing,... it just happened! 

my belief system as for phoenix lights is this: i believed it was true and happened physically as well as that it was a real space craft driven by either our govt or other intelligent species from within our galaxy. as said before, i actually was not an eye witness of the phoenix lights, but from all videos and said descriptions of the sighting from eye witnesses, this ufo that i saw had / was using what appeared to be the same type of cloaking technology where i could see the normal sky in between  the orbs. also, this ufo appeared much higher in the sky and didnt form a chevron like the phoenix lights one did.

in a nutshell, i 100% without a doubt know i saw an alien or possibly top secret government craft that was cloaked and peacefully traveling over west phoenix that day on junuary 31st, 2012 at 3:30pm in the afternoon. hopefully others might have seen it as well and can confirm it with me.  

i now fully believe that they are and have been here as well as everywhere among us for all of our known history. with an open and intelligent fact based / logical mind, you can still see them if you pay attention and simply accept that truth. they are physically here! maybe we are their experiment and future?... they may need us perhaps more than we need them!!
content.summary: Ufo sighting at rose mofford park over west phoenix, az on 01-31-2012 at 3:30pm, 6 muted color orbs, cloaked surface

content.detailedDescription:
December  3rd at approx 6 pm or so... three women viewed a ufo above our car. ( in the southern pines area of nc). all three of us saw the object.  earlier (only myself) saw in the distance lights  and a ufo that split into two. thirty minutes later....????  we all had an experience that we can't put together. the time does not seem right and we all had hardly any emotions during the sighting. as for me... i am shocked the way i reacted. so blah... and did not react at all. very odd.  we all were too calm. ??? so strange not to over react????? 
 
i'd like to discuss this further and put all the pieces together. we are three level headed women that are all between the ages of **-**. we set out to explore the village of southern pines, nc for the day and had no idea what was instore for us that evening. please contact me if you are interested in helping us figure out what this was. i'd be interested in knowing if others saw it and if any reportings of ufos in the area. i'd like to contact the air traffic controller in that air space.
content.summary: Three women viewed a ufo above our car

content.detailedDescription:
I went out side around 6:20 and saw 3 orange spheres moving rapidly up from the nw toward charlotte . i am in fort mill, sc. the formed up a triangle, hanging motionless. then two of the orange lights appeared to merge into one, then slowly vanished. my neighbor and my wife both saw this. my neighbor stood outside watching as two more orange orbs move upward and hung motionless in the same area as the other 3 had been. these were brighter, more orb-like. the hung there mortionless, sometimes they looked like they were dancing around each other until they vanished. two more, much brighter and more spherical rose up from the same direction. they were much brighter than the previous 5 that i had seen. my neighbor and i continued to watch. these too slowly faded out, to a low magnitude star-like appearance, then disappeared. 
i asked my neighbor if he had ever seen anything like this. he said he was a trained pilot, had been in the military and seen a lot of aircraft, but none behaved like this. there was a lot of air traffic  coming  out of charlotte airport (we are in the flight path and one airplane flew almost directly over head. in the distance, beyond the tree line i could see other aircraft making their approach to the airport. 
what ever these orange orbs were, they did not behave like aircraft.  nor were they meteors and fireballs (i have observed and reported these also in the past to the american meteor society). they were not planets, or stars (i���ve been a sky watcher/amateur astronomer for years). they could have been flares or fireworks from the carowinds area north of fort mill , but they did not behave like fireworks.
i did not notice any more orbs after 6:28pm, as i was taking garbage to recycle. i keep looking but failed to observer any further orange orbs as i drove off and came back.
i do not know what these were. but there were at least 3 witnesses who observed the same thing in the sky.
content.summary: I went out side around 6:20 and saw 3 orange spheres moving rapidly up from the nw toward charlotte

content.detailedDescription:
I currently serve as a full time commissioned law enforcement officer within the state of arizona, new mexico and utah, i'm submitting this witness statment on behalf of two (2) individuals who wish to remain anonymous.

(the mother-48 years old):
on saturday evening, january 21, 2012 at 7:15 pm (it had already got dark), i was coming back with my daughter from gallup, new mexico, as we turned onto navajo route#4, from highway#191, at the pinon junction. i saw a chain or row of bright lights approximately (1) mile west of an area known as "the pond". the lights were huge, bright and the row was approximately (100+) hundred yards in length. i shouted to my daughter "what is that?" thats when this single row of white lights shut off and approximately (1) second later a large array of orange lights came on. this formation lights was at least (300+) feet long, by approximately (3) stories high, it's appearance looked like that of a power plant or a city. these lights were arranged in rows and columns with the appearance of windows with white flashes of light that appeared to be on the inside, there were at least (50) or more of these windows. suddenly the lights shut off. we did not know if the object took off after we passed it. there was a loud boom like a "sonic boom" and a flash of light from behind a hill that was behind where the object had been. it is unknown if the object had been hovering or was actually touching the ground. this area where the object was is flat and wide open range, there are no other man made structures in this area. there were other motorist traveling on route# 4 and highway# 191 at the same time that would have also witnessed the event.

(the daughter-22 years old):
on saturday, january 21, 2012, about 7:15 pm on our way back from town, my mom directed my attention towards a huge pattern of orange lights about a mile from our moving vehicle. the lights were at eye level and appeared to be in rectangular windows-the pattern had smaller lights flashing at random within. the length of the object was at least (100+) yards across. my first thoughts in comparing what i saw would be that of a power plant or city, but the rectangles were distinct and in rows and columns. the orange lights lasted for about (5) seconds and turned off (like a light switch being turned off). about (2-3) seconds later, in the same direction, but further away there was a loud "boom" and white light was radiating behind a nearby hill. the light was coming from the ground. i also noticed in the foreground a black dome that did not move. this lasted (1-2) seconds. as we drove pased the site i kept looking in that direction to see if i could see any other lights, but i did not see anything. about that time we did notice that there was a power outage in all the nearby communities. the weather also drastically changed. there was blizzard-like conditions on the rest of the drive home. i did not notice any changes with myself physically-just that i got a strage eerie calm/paranoid feeling. another thing, before the orange lights disappeared, i reached for my phone to get a picture of the lights, but as i was putting in my password my phone completely shut off. i don't know if that is directly related to what we saw, but i had enough battery life for this not to happen.
content.summary: A row of white lights appeared in the distance for 1 or 2 seconds, then a large rectangular array of orange lights (300+ ft. x 3 stories) appeared for 5 seconds with small random flashing white lights. the lights shut off and a sonic boom occurred.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking down the street observing the moon with a lot of clouds obscuring it. i first noticed the object because since childhood i have observed many objects in sky, including planets and stars. i hunted for the galaxy andromeda at one time.
whenn i thought i saw a very interesting star formation i kept looking at it, noticing the very regular 5 star pattern that was made. then i realized it was impossible to see the stars, as the sky was obscured by clouds.
i stopped looking at the object because i had other things to do and this
funny craft was not moving or doing anything..
content.summary: Five stars in a pentagle, i thought were stars but then observed heavy clouds so object was below clouds and structure was very regular

content.detailedDescription: I don't know of any craft with these characteristics.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Sighted white light on landing path to o'hare airport, thought airplane, had no red and green light, only white randomly blinking light, suddenly changed course to sort of figure 8 patterns

content.detailedDescription: It was around midnight, i stepped out of my room to  ask  my mother a question, and saw what i have seen before. a bright multi-color flashing light
content.summary: Bright light flashing many colors, had an erratic flight path.

content.detailedDescription: 4 orbes. the lower right orbe systematically jumped to eachother orbe & pulsated as the lower right orbe made contact with the other orbes. then it just disappeared.
content.summary: 4 orbes. lower right orbe systematically jumped to eachother orbe & pulsated as the lower right orbe made contact with the other orbes. then it just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: 4 orbes. the
content.summary: 4 orbes. lower right orbe systematically jumped to eachother orbe & pulsated as the lower right orbe made contact with the other orbes. then it just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: 1 white light about 5 feet off the ground hovered outside pole barn window then went to the top of building and hovered in front of the coopala came back down back to the window then it went to the back of the building. snuck up on it in the back of the building and it had turned into about 7 lights about 8 feet away from me. i said what the, it heard me got much brighter then shot off into the woods.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Upon the 7 or 8 lights seeing me they got much brighter then shot off into the woods it came back again but when it saw the camera it took off again lowest altitude was about 5 feet

content.detailedDescription: Hi, while taking pictures of chemtrails in path of sun during sunset at 4:25 pm pst, latter while deleting and observing, spotted two orbs. one on left side of chemtrail next to sun. then a non orb pix, then the orb on other side of sun. very dramitic pix! looks like a moon. except moon was far behind me.  i also sent in orange orb pictures in januaray 2012. these are very clear and large, camera picked up the orbs. which hurt your eyes because of sun facing you. guy,  whittier
content.summary: Taking chemtrail pictures , scanning found large white orb moved from left to right .

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on porch. (on a sunday in april) facing stockton. dog in lap. dog gets animated. couldn't keep her in lap, so put her inside. ten minutes later, to my left, something flashed into the sky. i looked, and it seemed like it had stalled or slowed down. it was a huge thing. there was a white light on top, and two white lights on each side that were slightly smaller. there was a blueish- purple under belly that would be consistent with a saucer bottom. the under belly went from the small white lights on each side of the thing. the bigger white light on top made the thing almost look like a triangle, but the under belly gave it the saucer shape. i couldn't see a body on the craft inbetween. maybe because it happened fast, or because it was dark out.    it was a very clear, still night. so, when i saw this craft enter the sky it just appearead. no noise at all. it went north for about 4 seconds very clearly. it was quite close, maybe 1-2 miles from me, but huge. i watched it leave a short trail that evaporated quickly. it was strange that the trail was the same color as the under belly. then it turned so fast, shot north east, but a little bit skyward, as soon as it turned and shot it looked like it went through the sky, because it just dissapeared completely. leaving also the blueish-purple trail. i have listed this report with the national reporting in washington state. i would love it if someone from the stocton area would look into the archived news articles. i never got to see what they said. maybe there's another witness, or witness testimony in the article that might match mine. i just wish i was clearer on the year. (my nephew was sitting next to me and saw everything also) i was around 12 then, and this has stuck with me my whole life. i don't really know yet if i've been cursed or blessed with this in my life. i remember seeing it as if it was 5 minutes ago. i wish everyone knew the truth. i have pondered the fact that the dog picked up the thing 10 full minutes before it showed up, and that a machine that hears what a dog can might pick these things up, or validate a video. i think they are using sound to navigate, and the dogs are hearing it. ok ..All done. i know people read this stuff and think "wacko's", but if you told me to recant my experience or die, i'd laugh in your face and let you shoot me. amen, and good will to all. i hope we are all on the same universal page soon.
content.summary: It was a sunday in april- 1978, maybe 1979. in stockton record paper on monday- allot of witnesses. definately a ship. haunted me my whole life. awesome to see advanced technology in action.

content.detailedDescription: I was working at the hospital in ronan and took a break to check my facebook status when a friend of mine posted that she had been watching a ufo.  i went to look for myself and took a video of it.
content.summary: It would dim as the hours went by, looked farther away.  did a drunken zagging pattern continuously and lights would get dim and bright.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking directly east on the sidewalk about 2 blocks from my house.  my kid and dog were with me.  we commented on the fair 
weather.  it was a warm, breezy, hazy evening.  i pointed back to the southwest and commented on the pretty moon.  it had a beautiful pinkish aura and was perfectly cresent shaped.
  
i then referred to the constellation orion the hunter, more to my south.  it was bright and i could see all stars that i know of in the constellation, even the glow of his scabard, sweeping down from his belt could be seen, the tip of it was very bright.  sometimes it is hard to see every star in orion and i thought that when we got past the tree that was blocking my view, i would be able to see both stars that mark his feet.  a tree blocked his left foot from my right-sided view.  


my kid was chatting away about "ya mom, orion is the easiest constellation to see from the midwestern us......".  right at that point in time is when i saw 3 giant pink orbs of light come into my view, directly into and below the star of orions left foot.

i stop and point.  "look at that!" then is see about 5 or 6 more orbs of light.  dumbstruck, i freeze taking in what looked to me like 7 or 8 orbs of light that were in a v shaped flying pattern.  the front orb of the v was pointing right at orion's left star foot and began to move across the sky from my right to left.  

another orb of brighter light joins them to form almost a perfect v of 9 lights and maybe a smaller dimmer one coming in.  they were not flashing lights, more like a pulsating light.  most looked pinkish to me but, a few looked brighter and more yellow, though smaller.  the ones flying in were smaller and very bright white until they got closer to the formation, joined it and then got more yellow.

as it began to move, i was just astounded at what i saw as it stretched out across the width of orions starred feet and it looked enormous!  i was shouting "look, look, look at that!!"

the ufo had stopped almost dead on top of the feet stars of orion and i realized that i was seeing the most enormous object i have ever seen in my lifetime. so, from my orientation, it spanned tip to tip between orion's feet and after picking up the other couple of white then yellow orbs, started to move again!

i am shouting "look at the lights, they are over his feet!  look, look they're moving!  see, see?!" i wanted for my kid to see this too! 

the ufo accellerated and kind of streaked off into the night sky and disappeared from my view.  it had a pinkish glow and it went fast, leaving a beautiful pinkish trail of sparkly light that just kind of faded. it was beautiful.  

the whole sighting was probably about 30 or 40 seconds max. 

after it was gone, i kind of looked around, you know, to see if there were any car lights or lights or anything that could have been reflecting in my view.  i wasn't wearing glasses.  all is quiet, no cars,no people. we kept walking east, toward our block.

i dismissed my kids suggestions that maybe i had seen a plane, or helicopter or jet fighter.  i didn't hear anything.  what i saw was none of those things.  what i saw was so enormous, it is almost scary and that is why i keep referring to orion's feet.  that really gave me something to scale this object on and wow!

the thing that strikes me the most about this sighting is that the ufo was 3 dimensional to me.  it was not just a flat set of big, bright dots in the sky. it was not as if i was looking thru holes punched in paper or at stationary stars. it was 3 dimensional.  i have tried to draw it and i am no artist so it just ends up looking like a v with circles drawn inside of it. too bad!

i did some internet research and saw videos that are very similar to what i saw, some very recent. it is my hope that this post helps someone else that may have ever had a similar experience. 

thank you!<:
content.summary: V shaped pattern of round, pulsing lights. 5 or six pink and then 2 yellow and 2 white that flew in joined the formation, then changed to pink.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home suburbs of melbourne, australia, (23 july 2009) taking photos of a new moon which was setting in the west just on dusk. i used a tripod and timed shutter on several shots. the camera was a sony alpha digital slr with a 300mm lens zoomed to infinity. settings were iso 400, o ev, f/5.6, 2.5. i didn't notice anything at the time either through the lens or in the sky.

last saturday i was looking through the photos and noticed the ufo in the last shot, taken 1min 10sec after the previous one. i hadn't viewed these shots on the computer screen until now. the object was clearly in the shot, it's hard to miss! when i first saw the object i immediately thought it was a massive ufo. the shot is focussed on the moon and the object is also in fairly good focus. i sent the picture to a photographer who assured me it was not an artefact of the camera. he also advised that the technical aspect of the shot makes the object an "enormous distance" away which makes it an enormous object. 

the object is extremely wide, seemingly much wider than long. i've seen shots of the iss in relation to the moon at a distance of 220 miles above the earth - this seems much, much bigger, though the distance is difficult to know. it has pointed 'wings' with a vertical pair of red lights close to either end and another pair of reds lights in the middle. in between each set of red lights are 3 white lights that appear to be higher on the object than the red lights. it is an unusual shape, seemingly curved between each set of red lights. 

examining the photo it appears that the object is travelling to the south-east, towards the bottom left of the photo. this is demonstrated in the pixel trail as well as the slight difference in distance between the left to middle red lights, which is longer than the middle to right red lights.

i instantly knew that my camera had caught something big but spent a week examining, thinking, researching, ruling out camera defect, plane, other known aircraft. amazed that i'd had this shot on my computer for 2.5 years without knowing. also amazed at the minuscule chances of capturing an object like this by accident.

i haven't lost sight of it - the photo's on my desktop!
content.summary: Extremely large ufo found in a photo i took of the moon.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out my bedroom window at dusk and saw a bright disc just over the horizon of trees along the ocean at the start of pch it seemed. the disc was luminous and appeared to gleam and reflect and change in brightness as it swayed across the sky. fell like a feather slowly, with control, bobbing up at times, and once to the treeline it slipped from sight for a second and then came back up and up and up swaying slightly and glowed. i watched it bob across the sky in the general vicinity of that area several times for a good minute before it disappeared. i knew it wasn't a plane because i could see other planes in the sky. there was no fog. i would be amazed if no one else reported it- i've never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Saw a glowing luminous disc swaying back and forth along the horizon near the ocean, then it went up and repeated itself in diff. patterns, finally disappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
1. where were you and what were you doing at the time?
location was on stonecrest in prestonsburg, ky on 1-15-12 during the timeframe between 1630-1800. i was playing xbox and looked out the window.

2. what made you first notice the object?
the odd shape, color of the trail, slow movement, and elevation

3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it?
at first thought it was just another aircraft, but several other high altitude aircraft were visible, all were obviously visible commercial planes. they appeared to moving much faster than this object and at significantly higher altitude. also, the number of helicopters and light aircraft in the area seemed more abundant than usual. 

4. describe the object and its actions and motions in detail.
after longer observation it appeared to be a missile of some sort, but even that didn't "fit". it was long cigar shaped dark brownish to black, the trail appeared dark reddish turning pale orange near the tail and was much shorter/fatter than the typical aircraft i usually see. it moved much slower than the norm, before a plane is out of sight is 15-20 minutes(i have an almost a 360 degree view of the horizon), this object was witnessed for nearly an hour and a half and was noticed only halfway across the horizon. it was on what appeared a straight line path moving on an approximate n-s trajectory. object also appeared to stop/hover then proceed on. when this happened the trail became significantly smaller.

5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object.
was a little awe struck, made my wife and daughter come outside to look and the reaction of "what the hell is that" was shared across the board. i remained on the back porch until the object was no longer visible. i snapped two images from an iphone. also, after the sighting i told jason reichenbach about it in casual conversation and he directed me to mufon.

6. how did you lose sight of the object?
it disappered over the horizon.
content.summary: Unknown object over eastern ky golf course
